title: "What will prompt AI art to come of age?"
excerpt: "Small tiered waterfalls in tropical woods…This time the AI tool threw up an image that was picture perfect. There was a prompt asking if the picture needed to be evolved further. That’s how the red parrot got into the picture. As one can see, the picture could get as detailed as one wishes."
